title: riot im sure you are aware people are slowly moving away from lol because they want something new
body: i think rito should exercise innovation and creativity...... introduce some genuinely new things, not just champions (bard was a step in right direction) but new maps that are as maintained as summoners rift but offer a different strategy all together. like make a summoners rift with no lanes just one huge jungle, with more jungle camps and more brushes and the minions will just randomly try and go thru the jungle them selves....making for more guerilla type strategies. while this idea in itself may not be good for reasons you may know, i am just saying the time for something new has come
